statements.select:
select AreaId2Name,AreaId3Name,ResidentName,IDNo,AssessmentResult,AssessmentResultNodes,IncomeStatus,IncomeStatusNodes ,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('12002',ServeItemType) ServeItemTypeName,StationName from ( select Id,Status,ResidentId,AreaId,AreaId2,AreaId2Name,AreaId3,AreaId3Name,ResidentName,IDNo,AssessmentResult,AssessmentResultNodes,IncomeStatus,IncomeStatusNodes ,StationId,StationName ,(select top 1 Status from Eva_EvaluatedReport where RequisitionId=qu.RequisitionId order by Id desc) Rep_Status ,(select top 1 CheckInTime from Eva_EvaluatedReport where RequisitionId=qu.RequisitionId order by Id desc) Rep_CheckInTime ,(select top 1 ServeItemType from Eva_EvaluatedReport where RequisitionId=qu.RequisitionId order by Id desc) ServeItemType from Eva_EvaluatedRequisition_V qu ) eva right join (select ResidentId as Eva_ResidentId ,MAX(Id) as Eva_Id from Eva_EvaluatedRequisition group by ResidentId)eva_t on eva.Id=eva_t.Eva_Id and eva.ResidentId=eva_t.Eva_ResidentId where Rep_Status=1 and Status=1 AreaId=#AreaId# AreaId2=#AreaId2# AreaId3=#AreaId3# IncomeStatus=#IncomeStatus# Rep_CheckInTime>=#CheckInTimeFrom# Rep_CheckInTime<=#CheckInTimeTo# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$

select AreaId2Name,AreaId3Name,ResidentName,IDNo,AssessmentResult,AssessmentResultNodes,IncomeStatusNodes ,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('12002',ServeItemType) ServeItemTypeName,StationName,ServiceSubsidies from ( select Id,Status,ResidentId,AreaId,AreaId2,AreaId2Name,AreaId3,AreaId3Name,ResidentName,IDNo,AssessmentResult,AssessmentResultNodes,IncomeStatusNodes ,StationId,StationName ,(select top 1 Status from Eva_EvaluatedReport where RequisitionId=qu.RequisitionId order by Id desc) Rep_Status ,(select top 1 CheckInTime from Eva_EvaluatedReport where RequisitionId=qu.RequisitionId order by Id desc) Rep_CheckInTime ,(select top 1 ServeItemType from Eva_EvaluatedReport where RequisitionId=qu.RequisitionId order by Id desc) ServeItemType ,(select top 1 ServiceSubsidies from Eva_EvaluatedReport where RequisitionId=qu.RequisitionId order by Id desc) ServiceSubsidies from Eva_EvaluatedRequisition_V qu ) eva right join (select ResidentId as Eva_ResidentId ,MAX(Id) as Eva_Id from Eva_EvaluatedRequisition group by ResidentId)eva_t on eva.Id=eva_t.Eva_Id and eva.ResidentId=eva_t.Eva_ResidentId where Rep_Status=1 and Status=1 AreaId=#AreaId# AreaId2=#AreaId2# AreaId3=#AreaId3# Rep_CheckInTime>=#CheckInTimeFrom# Rep_CheckInTime<=#CheckInTimeTo# ServeItemType=#ServeItemType# ServiceSubsidies>#ServiceSubsidies# $WhereClause$
$OrderByClause$
